note: Mostly posting my own articles and photography that I share with nearly half a million followers on social media. Still feel new here, but I like Mastodon; it’s a breath of fresh air. What more to know? I’m the editor of The Planet: theplanet.substack.com and: Public Speaker | Podcaster | TEDx | Climate Change | Wildlife | Art | Energy-Water-Food | Sustainability

fields.name: The Planet newsletter
